Articles.Content:
Heya,

really just a small thing, I think.

I'd love to have a Mk2 Drone Nose (like the cockpit, but without cockpit), considering how compact the Mk2 Drone "slice" is, most of the space inside the nose could be used as either a Liquid Fuel tank or LFO.

Back when I used B9, I modded one of the SAS-wheels to work as a Decoupler. But as the Mk2 Drone Core has modelled torque wheels and stuff, I'd like to have an "empty" one (maybe even with some arrows on the sides) to work as decoupler.
Goddamnit, how did I miss that? Thanks!

> 
> Goddamnit, how did I miss that? Thanks!

You're welcome.
